# # DirectDebit
An object representing direct debit details for invoices.

```php
use Xendit\Invoice\DirectDebit;
```

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Examples |
|------------|:-------------:|:-------------:|-------------|:-------------:|
| **direct_debit_type** | [**DirectDebitType**](DirectDebitType.md) | ☑️ |  | null |
